column17:
A fabulous dinner set to serve the food with style from the house of Real. This well-equipped set comprises of 32 pieces that have a big centre plate serving plates quarter plates small bowls serving spoons and serving bowls. The whole set is orange in colour and has a beautiful design on it. The set is just perfect for your dinner table.

Features
  • Brand: Real
  • Category: Home Ware
  • Colour: Orange
  • Material: Melamine
  • Shape: Square
  • Content: 1 piece big plate 6 pieces each of full plates quarter plates 12 pieces vegetable bowls 2 piece serving bowls with lid 3 piece serving spoons
  • Other Features: Unbreakable

Care Tips
Wash with warm soapy water
Rinse and dry thoroughly
For removal of stubborn residues allow the dish to cool partially fill with warm soapy water and allow it to soak for 10 to 20 minutes before the wash
